title: EBC Ultimax2™ Brake Pad
description: The Ultimax2™ brake pad is a quality OEM replacement pad, made in the UK at the Bristol EBC Brakes manufacturing plant. The Ultimax2™ brake pad is a beautifully engineered brake compound that lasts well, produces minimal dust and is the perfect choice for the urban or daily driver.
tags: EBC Brakes, EBC Ultimax 2 Brake Pads, replacement brake pads
